definitions.body: sign, pledge, token Ge 4:15 (J); [[אוֹת אֱמֶת]] true, token Jos 2:12 (J); of blood of passover Ex 12:13 (P); [[אוֹת לְטוֹבָה]] token for good Ps 86:17; pledges, assurances of travellers Job 21:29.

signs, omens promised by prophets as pledges of certain predicted events 1Sa 10:7, 1Sa 10:9 + v:1Sa 10:1 where ´[[א]] ins. LXX Vulgate, vid. We Dr; esp. phr. [[זֶה הָאוֹת לְ]] Ex 3:12, 1Sa 2:34, 1Sa 14:10, 2Ki 19:29, Je 44:29, Is 7:11, Is 7:14; prob. also Is 44:25 (of false proph.).
sign, symbol  of prophets Is 8:18 cf. Ez Eze 4:3.

signs, miracles, as pledges or attestations of divine presence & interposition Ex 4:8, Ex 4:8, Ex 4:9 (J) Ex 7:3 (P) Ex 8:19 (J) Ps 74:9, 2Ki 19:29, 2Ki 20:8, 2Ki 20:9 = Is 37:30, Is 38:7, Is 38:22; c. [[עָשָׂה]] Ex 4:17, Ex 4:30, Nu 14:11, Nu 14:22, Jos 24:17 (all JE) De 11:3, Ju Jdg 6:17; c. [[חִוׇּה]] Ex 4:28 (J); c. [[שִׁית]] Ex 10:1 (J); c. [[שִׂים]] Ex 10:2 (J) Ps 78:43, Is 66:19; [[הָאוֹת וְהַמּוֹפֵת]] (v. [[מוֹפֵת]]) De 13:3 cf. De 28:46, Is 20:3; ´[[אוֹ מ]] ´[[א]] De 13:2; [[אוֹתוֹת וּמוֹפְתִים]] De 4:34 De 7:19, De 26:8, De 29:2, Je 32:31; c. [[נׇתַן]] De 6:22, Ne 9:10; c. [[שִׂים]] Je 32:20, Ps 105:27; c. [[שָׁלַח]] De 34:11, Ps 135:9.

signs, memorials, stones fr. Jordan Jos 4:6 (J); metal of censers Nu 17:3 (P); Aaron's rod Nu 17:25 (P); [[עוֹלָם]] ´[[א]] Is 55:13 prob. also Ez Eze 14:8 (‖[[מָשָׁל]]); signs on hands, etc., Ex 13:9, Ex 13:16 (J) = De 6:8, De 11:18, prob. belong here; also memorial pillar in Egypt Is 19:20.

sign, pledge of convenant, [[הַבְּרִית]] ´[[א]] (v. [[ברית]]) e.g. rainbow, of Noachian convenant Ge 9:12, Ge 9:13, Ge 9:17 (P); circumcision, of Abrahamic convenant Ge 17:11 (P); the sabbath Ex 31:13, Ex 31:17 (P); Ez Eze 20:12, Eze 20:20.
signs, tokens of changes of weather & times Ge 1:14 (P; of heavenly luminaries) [[אוֹתוֹת הַשָּׁמַיִם]] Je 10:2 (changes of the heavens as omens to frighten the nations) cf. Ps 65:9.
